text: Class of 1999 is a 1990 science fiction movie. This movie is set in the future year of 1999. It is about youth gang violence in schools. Pam Grier plays Miss Connors. Malcolm McDowell plays Miles Langford. The movie was released on May 11, 1990. Lester
title: Class of 1999
